actions.Lance: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit (with disadvantage against a target within 5 ft.), reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage, or 11 (1d12 + 5) piercing damage while mounted.
actions.Dagger: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.Feather Fall: The rider wears a magic ring with which it can cast the feather fall spell on itself once as a reaction to falling. After the spell is cast, the ring becomes nonmagical.
